title: How to Make Mars Bar Custard

steps.headline: Cut the Mars Bar into small pieces.
Pour the custard into a small saucepan.
steps.description: Sprinkle in the chopped Mars Bar pieces.

steps.headline: Gently heat the custard over low heat.
Pour the cut mars chocolate on the top of the custard.
Stir until all traces of the Mars Bar have melted into the custard.
Pour custard into bowls, or serve over pudding.

text: Cut the Mars Bar into small pieces.  Pour the custard into a small saucepan. Sprinkle in the chopped Mars Bar pieces. Gently heat the custard over low heat. Stir all the time. Pour the cut mars chocolate on the top of the custard.  Stir until all traces of the Mars Bar have melted into the custard.  Pour custard into bowls, or serve over pudding.  Finished.
